name: Impossible Mission 2025
description: Impossible Mission 2025 is a side scrolling platform and action game for the Amiga computer system. It was released by MicroProse in 1994 as two different versions. One for the Amiga 500 and 600 systems, and a version for the AGA enhanced Amiga 1200, 4000 and CD32 systems. A third version was developed for the Super NES and Sega Genesis, but never released.
